'''Gundor''' ({{FA|419}}-{{FA|456|n}},<ref>{{WJ|West}}, ''Commentary, (ii) The House of Hador''</ref> aged 37) was the third child and the younger son of [[Hador|Hador Lórindol]].  

Gundor and his father Hador fought in the [[Dagor Bragollach]] and both died, pierced with many arrows at [[Eithel Sirion]].<ref>{{S|Fingolfin}}</ref>
